mapper.select: select textbook.*,syllabus.id as s_id,syllabus.title as s_title from syllabus right outer join textbook on syllabus.id = syllabus_id
mapper.insert: insert into textbook (syllabus_id, title, year, author) value (#{syllabus_id}, #{title}, #{year}, #{author})
mapper.update: update textbook set syllabus_id = #{syllabus_id}, title = #{title}, year = #{year}, author = #{author} where textbook.id = #{id}
